entries.claim_text: The October 2023 BIS rule update restricted export of chips with total processing performance above 4800 TOPS.

source.title: BIS Export Control Rule Oct 2023
source.excerpt: ...any integrated circuit with TPP exceeding 4800 TOPS is subject to license requirement...

entries.claim_text: NVIDIA shipped approximately $2.5B in H100 chips to Middle Eastern distributors in Q3 2023 before the rule change.

source.title: NVIDIA 10-Q Q3 2023
source.excerpt: Data center revenue of $14.5B included significant international shipments...

entries.notes: Regional breakdown inferred from analyst commentary.

entries.claim_text: Some Chinese firms have begun acquiring restricted chips through third-party shell entities in Southeast Asia.

source.title: AI-generated inference
source.excerpt: Some Chinese firms have begun acquiring restricted chips through third-party shell entities in Southeast Asia.

entries.notes: Reuters reporting referenced but no named entities per publication policy.

entries.claim_text: Model training throughput at major Chinese AI labs is estimated to have declined 18–22% following the 2023 rule.

source.title: AI-generated inference
source.excerpt: Model training throughput at major Chinese AI labs is estimated to have declined 18–22% following the 2023 rule.

entries.notes: Analyst estimate from SemiAnalysis; not independently verified.
